::: {.callout}
There are specific reasons we might want to replace meat (*sustainability*).
By studying meat closely we can determine how to replace it effectively.
An important aspect is recreating its fibrous `structure`. 
There is a need to find plant-based `materials` high in protein and a
`process` to form them into that structure.
If successful the product will `function` as expected.
:::
